articles.author: Bloomberg
articles.title: Chinatowns Worldwide Face Virus Fallout
articles.description: Businesses in Chinatowns around the world are taking a hit because of coronavirus panic. Panic-buying of sanitizers, face masks however sees some firms thrive. (Source: QuickTake)

articles.author: Olivia Carville
articles.title: Expedia will cut 3,000 jbs to simplify ‘bloated’ business
articles.description: The staff reductions will affect about 3,000 employees, including 500 people in Expedia's Seattle-based headquarters. The workers will begin to be notified this week.
articles.content:
Expedia said it’s cutting thousands of jobs, striving to simplify the “bloated organization” and return the online travel giant to more disciplined growth.
The staff reductions will affect about 3,000 employees, including 500 people in Expedia’s Seattle-base… [+2631 chars]

articles.title: No OPEC Decision Yet on Oil Cuts, Saudi Energy Minister Says
articles.description: OPEC hasn’t decided yet to extend or modify its agreement to cut oil output, Saudi Arabia’s energy minister said, as the coronavirus batters the global economy and threatens demand for crude.
